title: Automated Drone
description: Work in Progress: Autonomous drone that follows user and avoids obstacles. Uses computer vision to detect objects and navigate through environment. Also controlled by user without controller through use of hand gestures.

title: Cortana Hologram A.I
description: Voice activated hologram A.I. that can have real conversations perform tasks. Utilized APIS and Peppers Ghost to create an illusion.

title: Star Wars Galaxy of Heroes Farming Calculator
description: Aside from this portfolio I made a project website for a mobile game, Star Wars Galaxy of Heroes. Benefited community by providing an in depth database for in game units and strategies.
